Name: ABIT
Effects: Words of prayer that remove 1 debuff from 1 ally row.
Detail: Resistance up incrementally added based on skill level and increased number of debuffs removed. Increased Resistance and area of Effects.

Name: Adept's Rule of Thumb
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with Detect and Disarm Trap increased even further.
Detail: Detect and Disarm Trap increased further based on skill level.

Name: Advice of the Skull
Effects: Increases damage against undead and decreases damage from undead.

Name: Aegis Bash
Effects: Moderate physical attack with high Accuracy on 1 enemy. Reduces damage taken from enemies for 3 turns. Damage is reduced and the amount of damage reduction is decreased if learned by someone other than Lanavaille.
Detail: Efficacy and damage reduction from enemies increased based on skill level.

Name: Agent of Heresy
Effects: Increases damage to enemies for everyone in the user's row if it has only evil or neutral allies.

Name: Air Formation
Effects: Increases damage to earth type enemies for user and adjacent air type allies if there are at least 2 air type allies adjacent to the user.

Name: Air Resistance Weakening
Effects: By whispering malicious things to surrounding entities, there is a chance of decreasing the air-type tolerance of 1 enemy row for 2 turns.
Detail: Probability increased and Air-type Resistance Weakening effect is further increased based on skill level. Additional turns incrementally added.

Name: Air Type Thaumaturgy
Effects: Reduces air-type damage to self.
Detail: Damage decreased further based on skill level.

Name: Air-Kin Blessing
Effects: Reduces air type damage for beastfolk in the same row.

Name: Albano's Revulsion
Effects: Continuously increases Defense Power and Paralysis Tolerance.
Detail: Defense Power and Paralysis Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

Name: Alchemist of Rebirth
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with MP and Piety increased even further.
Detail: MP and Piety further increased based on skill level.

Name: Alchemized Anima Dissolution
Effects: Deals moderate untyped spell damage based on Piety to 1 enemy row. Restores the HP of allies in the front row based on the damage dealt. Damage and HP recovery are reduced if learned by someone other than Raffaello.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: All Cover
Effects: Chance to beat single-target attacks in place of all allies for 1 turn.
Detail: Defense Power Up incrementally added based on skill level. Probability and Defense Power increased further. More turns added.

Name: All-Around Cover
Effects: Chance to intercept single-target attacks aimed at all allies for 1 turn (affected by Luck). The user enters a defensive state. The defensive state granted by this skill is unaffected by duration-extending skills.
Detail: Defense Power Up incrementally added based on skill level. Turns added incrementally. Probability and Defense Power further increased.

Name: Amnesiac Corpse Retriever
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with Attack Power, Magic Power, SP, and MP increased further.
Detail: Attack Power, Magic Power, SP, and MP further increased based on skill level.

Name: Anti-Adventurer Combat Technique
Effects: Increases damage against adventurers and decreases damage from adventurers.

Name: Anticipated Attack
Effects: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy in which Surety occurs more easily. Efficacy increases with Attack Power and Accuracy. Bypasses Defense Power and guarantees Surety on enemies in preparation. Always hits enemies trying to evade, but damage is reduced.
Detail: Efficacy and Defense Power bypass rate increased based on skill level.

Name: Anticipation
Effects: Increases Evasion rate against physical attacks when targeted by the same enemy. Effect ends when an attack is received.
Detail: Evasion rate furnther increased based on skill level.

Name: Apostle of Breaking Commandments
Effects: Increases Tolerance of Insta-Kill, Skill-Binding, and Spell-Binding for user and all adjacent dark type allies.

Name: Apothecary's Knowledge
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, HP and Poison Tolerance increased further.
Detail: HP and Poison Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

Name: Armor Break
Effects: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy. Chance to decrease Defense Power based on the user's Dexterity.
Detail: Probability increased while Defense Power further decreased based on skill level.

Name: Armor Pierce
Effects: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy. Greatly penetrates Defense Power.
Detail: Efficacy increased while Defense Power further bypassed based on skill level.

Name: Armsmanship
Effects: Increases Accuracy and Action Speed when equipped with a one-handed weapon. Increases Accuracy and Attack Power when equipped with a two-handed weapon.
Detail: Accuracy and Action speed further increased based on skill level when equipped with a one-handed weapon. Accuracy and Attack Power further increased when equipped with a two-handed weapon.

Name: Art of Assassination
Effects: Chance of Critical occurring during normal attacks. Occurrence rate increased when bare-handed.
Detail: Critical occurrence rate increased based on skill level.

Name: Assault Guard
Effects: Greatly increases Defense Power during ambushes for 2 turns.
Detail: Defense Power incrementally increased further based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: Astral Break
Effects: Major earth type physical attack on 1 enemy. Bypasses Defense Power and increases Action Speed of user and allies in front or behind of 3 turns. Efficacy, Defense Power bypass rate, and Action Speed effect turns are reduced if learned by someone other than Arboris.
Detail: Efficacy increase and Action Speed increase effect turns incrementally increased based on skill level.

Name: Attract Hit
Effects: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy. User becomes more easily targeted by the affected enemy for 3 turns
Detail: Efficacy increased and user becomes more easily targeted by enemies, based on skill level.

Name: Back-against-the-Water Formation
Effects: Attack Power and Magic Power increase when HP drops below 50%.
Detail: Attack Power/Magic Power increased further based on skill level.

Name: BADI
Effects: Chance of dealing HP-scaled damage to 1 enemy of a race that bleeds.
Detail: Probability and damage scaling increased based on skill level.

Name: BADIOS
Effects: A light attack spell cast by a sacred prayer. Deals minor damage to 1 enemy based on the user's Divine Power. Damage is increased against undead.

Name: BALAFEOS
Effects: Intrudes on psyches over a wide area with a chance to reduce the Attack Power of 1 enemy row for 3 turns.
Detail: Probability increased while Attack Power decreased incrementally based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: Bamboo Splitter
Effects: Major physical attack on 1 enemy. Usable in Cresting Wave Stance.

Name: BATILGREF
Effects: Generates a bog underfoot over a wide area with a high chance of reducing the Evasion and Action Speed of 1 enemy row for 3 turns.
Detail: Probability increased while Evasion and Action Speed decreased incrementally based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: Bear Trap
Effects: Places a bear trap ain front of the user during exploration.  If an enemy or the ally party triggers the trap, they will be unable to move for a set time.  At rhe start of battle, all trapped targets take a fixed amount of damage and have rheir Action Speed and Evasion reduced for 2 turns. Does not affect floating enemies and is destroyed by large enemies.
Detail: Immobilization duration increased based on skill level.  Enemy Action Speed and Evasion further decreased.  Additional turns added.

Name: Beastfolk Thief Discipline
Effects: Continuously increases each stat.
Detail: Stats increased further based on skill level.

Name: Behind Cover
Effects: Chance to bear single-target attacks in place of allies in the back.
Detail: Physical damage reduction incrementally added based on skill level. Chance increased further and damage decreased further.

Name: Bestial Roar
Effects: Continuously increases each stat,  with HP and Attack Power increased further.

Detail: Evasion, efficacy, and Defense Power penetration rate incrementally increased based on skill level.

Name: Blazing Resplendence
Effects: Increases fire-type damage dealt to enemies and increases water-type damage taken from enemies for 4 turns.  Moderate physical attck on 1 enemy based on Attack Power and Magic Power. Damage and the fire-type damage inrcease amount are reduced if learned by someone other than Yoizou.

Name: Blessing of Agora
Effects: Adds 1 consecutive turn to buffs and debuffs applied by the user and increases MP. MP increase amount and growth amount of consecutive turns are reduced if learned by someone other than Alice.
Detail: Incrementally adds MP Up based on skill level. MP increased further and number of continuous turns augmented.

Name: Blessing of Owen
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with Attack Power and Confusion/Charm Tolerance increased even further.
Detail: Attack Power and Confusion/Charm Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

Name: Blessing of Renewal
Effects: Receive a blessing through prayer. Continuously restores minor HP of 1 ally for 4 turns.

Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Attack Power and Paralysis Tolerance increased further.
Detail: Attack Power and Paralysis Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

Name: Blessing of the Beastfolk Goddess

Effects: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy based on the user's Dexterity. Chance to decrease Accuracy.

Name: Blunt Combo Strike

Name: Bones of Obsessive Love
Effects: Restores minor MP to self when defeating an enemy.

Name: Branded Hands
Effects: Increases Accuracy when equipped with a two-handed weapon. Continuously increases the chill limit.
Detail: Chill limit is increased even further.

Name: Calamitous Rockfall
Effects: Useable when equipped with Two-Handed Staff of The Spirit Realm. Drops magic infused stones, dealing minor earth spell damage to 1 enemy row. Chance to reduce enemy Evasion for 3 turns.

Name: Calculated Charity
Effects: Reduces physical damage taken from enemies for the user and an ally in front of or behind them if the ally is evil.

Name: CALDIA
Effects: Expanded visibility increases the Accuracy and Surety Rate of 1 ally for 3 turns.

Name: Chaos Deified
Effects: Continuously increases MP and I.Q. and adds 1 consecutive turn to buffs and debuffs applied by the user. When this skill is inherited, Blessing of Agora is also inherited. This skill can be enhanced by inheriting Blessing of Agora, Innocent Fanaticism, or Chaos Deified.
Detail: MP, I.Q., and number of continuous turns increased based on skill level.

Name: Child of the Sacred Tree
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with Magic Power and Action Speed increased even further.

Effects: Attack Power and Magic Power increase each turn. However, the increase reverts if equipment is changed.

Name: Cry of Ruin

When attacking an enemy, deals damage to all enemies in the same row as the target, with damage reducing by distance from the target. Consumes 25% of the user's max HP after attacking. User's HP consumption is increased and damage is reduced if learned by someone other than Gillion.

Name: Cunning Pursuit
Effects: Increases Surety when attacking opponents affected by status afflictions or debuffs.

If rhe ally party triggers it, all allies take damage and haetheir Defense Power reduced at the start of battle.  Can only be placed in areas with a ceiling.  Does not affect slime-type enemies and cannot hit small enemies.

Name: Inheritor of the Secret Arts
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with Surety and Accuracy increased even further.
Detail: Surety and Accuracy increased further based on skill level.

Name: Innocent Fanaticism
Effects: Continuously increases MP and Piety and adds 1 consecutive turn to buffs and debuffs applied by the user. When this skill is inherited, Blessing of Agora is also inherited. This skill can be enhanced by inheriting Blessing of Agora, Innocent Fanaticism, or Chaos Deified.
Detail: MP, Piety, and number of continuous turns increased based on skill level.

Name: Instruction in Inner Stillness
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with Attack Power and Surety increased even further.
Detail: Attack Power and Surety increased further based on skill level.

Name: Interpersonal Combat Technique
Effects: Increases damage against humanoids and decreases damage from humanoids.

Name: Ira's Divine Protection
Effects: Continuously increases Divine Power.
Detail: Divine Power increased further based on skill level.

Name: KANTIOS
Effects: Chaotic energy over a wide area strips away the self-awareness of 1 enemy row with a chance of Confusing them.
Detail: Probability increased while Confusion becomes harder to remove based on skill level.

Name: KATINO
Effects: Generates sleep-inducing fumes over a wide area which have a chance of putting 1 enemy row to Sleep.
Detail: Probability increased while Sleep becomes harder to remove based on skill level.

Name: Killing Blow
Effects: Minor physical attack with high Accuracy on 1 enemy. When an enemy is defeated with this skill, after combat, there is a chance that the number of uses for specific skills or traps will be restored. The traps for which uses are replenished depend on the type of enemy. If an enemy is not defeated with this skill, the attacked enemy will become enraged for 4 turns. Enraged enemies will have greatly increased efficacy when attacking.
Detail: Trap replenishment rate increased based on skill level.

Name: KINAPIC
Effects: Receiving divine power to increase the Resistance of 1 ally row for 3 turns.
Detail: Resistance incrementally increased further based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: King's Disposition
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Accuracy and Stun Tolerance increased further.
Detail: Accuracy and Stun Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

Name: Knight's Creed
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Attack Power and Stun Tolerance increased further.
Detail: Attack Power and Stun Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

Name: Knight's Defense
Effects: Reduces all damage taken by all allies for 1 turn.
Detail: Damage decreased further based on skill level.

Name: Knight's Oath
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, SP and Resistance increased further.
Detail: SP and Resistance increased further based on skill level.

Name: Knowledge of Adventurers
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Attack Power and Detect increased further.
Detail: Attack Power and Detect increased further based on skill level.

Name: Knowledge of the Millennial Lord
Effects: Continuously reduces the MP/SP cost of Mage spells/skills that cost 3-10 MP/SP.

Name: Kunoichi Self-Discipline
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with Action Speed increased even further.
Detail: Stats increased further based on skill level.

Name: KUSFIS
Effects: Words of prayer that cure 1 ally of Skill-binding or Spell-binding.
Detail: Resistance up and HP recovery incrementally added based on skill level. Increased Resistance, area of Effects. and recovery amount.

Name: LACONES
Effects: Launches countless orbs of magic power that deal moderate untyped spell damage to all enemies.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: LAERLIK
Effects: Upheaves the ground, loosing a massive boulder which deals moderate earth spell damage to all enemies.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: LAFERU
Effects: Generates a massive tornado that shears all, dealing moderate air spell damage to all enemies.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: LAFOROS
Effects: Generates a shower of countless lights that deal moderate light spell damage to all enemies.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: LAHALITO
Effects: Generates a massive pillar of flame that consumes all, dealing moderate fire spell damage to all enemies.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: LAMIGAL
Effects: Generates a massive torrent of water that swallows all, dealing moderate water spell damage to all enemies.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: LATUMAPIC
Effects: Analyzing an enemy with enhanced eyes, the name of the nearest wandering enemy becomes known. In battle, the race and type of one enemy can be differentiated.
Detail: Effect changes based on skill level.

Name: LATUMOFIS
Effects: Words of prayer that cure 1 ally of Poison.
Detail: Resistance up, Critical Poison recovery, and HP recovery incrementally added based on skill level. Increased Resistance, area of Effects, and recovery amount.

Name: LAZELOS
Effects: Generates a powerful mass of hatred that deals moderate dark spell damage to all enemies.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: Light Resistance Weakening
Effects: By whispering malicious things to surrounding entities, there is a chance of decreasing the light-type tolerance of 1 enemy row for 2 turns.
Detail: Probability increased and Light-type Resistance Weakening effect is further increased based on skill level. Additional turns incrementally added.

Name: Light Shaft's Radiance
Effects: Increases damage to enemies for user and an ally in front of or behind them if the ally is light-type, with damage to dark-type enemies increased even further.

Name: Light Type Thaumaturgy
Effects: Reduces light-type damage to self.
Detail: Damage decreased further based on skill level.

Name: Light-Kin Blessing
Effects: Reduces light type damage for elves in the same row.

Name: Lightning Celerity
Effects: Increases Evasion when equipped with a one-handed sword.
Detail: Attack Power increased further based on skill level.

Name: Line Cover
Effects: Chance to bear single-target attacks in place of allies in 1 ally row for 1 turn.
Detail: Defense Power Up incrementally added based on skill level.

Name: Lingering Blossom
Effects: Increases Atttack Power and Surety for 3 turns. For 1 turn, the user becomes more likely to be targeted by enemies, and if they would take damage that reduces their HP to 0, they might persevere once with 1 HP. If the user perseveres, their Evasion, Attack Power, and Surety are increased for 4 turns. Chance of persevering and chance of being targeted are greatly reduced, and Evasion, Attack Power, and Surety increase amounts are also reduced if learned by anyone other than Shiou.
Detail: Chance of becoming more likely to be targeted, Evasion, Attack Power, and Surety increased even futher based on skill level.

Name: Linked Steps, Relentless Assault
Effects: Increases the damage of the next attack after defeating an enemy.
Detail: Damage further increased based on skill level.

Name: Locksmith's Craft
Effects: Continuously increases each stat. Evasion and Disarm Trap increased further.
Detail: Evasion and Disarm Trap increased further based on skill level.

Name: Lord of the Deep Forest's Leadership
Effects: Increases Evasion and Action Speed for user and all adjacent evil and neutral allies.

Name: Lucent MAFOROS
Effects: Channels additional Magic Power into MAFOROS, launching an even brighter, more powerful volley of light orbs that deals moderate light-type spell damage to 1 enemy row. Chance to reduce Accuracy for 3 turns. If the target is dark-type, damage dealt is increased and both the amount and chance of Accuracy reduction are higher. Damage is decreased while Accuracy reduction amount and chance are reduced if learned by someone other than Adam.
Detail: Damage increased, and the amount and chance of Accuracy reduction increased based on skill level.

Name: MABADIOS
Effects: A light-type attack spell cast by an exalted prayer. Deals minor damage to 1 enemy row based on the user's Divine Power. Damage is increased against undead.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: MACALDIA
Effects: Expanded visibility of the area increases the Accuracy and Surety Rate of 1 ally row for 3 turns.
Detail: Accuracy and Surety rate incrementally increased further based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: MACONES
Effects: Launches an orb of concussive magic power that deals minor untyped spell damage to 1 enemy row.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: MADALTO
Effects: Whips up a chilling blizzard gale, dealing minor untyped spell damage to 1 enemy row. Chance to inflict Chill on targets. If the target is already Chilled, the effect will progress further.
Detail: Probability increased and efficacy increased further based on skill level.

Name: MADI
Effects: Enveloped in blessed light, 1 ally is cured of Poison, Sleep, Stun, or Paralysis, and major HP is restored.
Detail: Target types and recovery amount increased based on skill level.

Name: MADIOS
Effects: Words of great blessing that restore minor HP to 1 ally row.
Detail: Recovery amount increased based on skill level.

Name: MAERLIK
Effects: Flings a stone that deals minor earth spell damage to 1 enemy row.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: MAFERU
Effects: Launches a massive blade of air that deals minor air spell damage to 1 enemy row.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: MAFOROS
Effects: Launches scattered orbs of light that deal minor light spell damage to 1 enemy row.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: Mage of the Black Rod
Effects: At the start of own turn, when user is in the front row, increases Attack Power, Defense Power, Accuracy, and Evasion, and when user is the back row, increases Magic Power, Magic Defense, and Resistance. Additionally, increases own Attack Power, Defense Power, Magic Defense, and Accuracy when equipped with a one-handed staff or one-handed sword.

Name: Magic Detection
Effects: Continuously increases Detect.
Detail: Detect increased further based on skill level.
Restriction: Mage/Mage of the Black Rod/Tall Mage-specific

Name: Magic Guard
Effects: Continuously increases Magic Defense when wearing heavy armor and when equipped with a heavy shield.
Detail: Magic Defense increased further based on skill level.

Name: Magic of the Dark One
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Divine Power and Magic Defense increased further.
Detail: Divine Power and Magic Defense increased further based on skill level.

Name: Magical Being Knowledge
Effects: Increases damage against magical beings and decreases damage from magical beings.

Name: MAHALITO
Effects: Launches a blazing fireball that deals minor fire spell damage to 1 enemy row.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: MAKALKI
Effects: Enveloped in divine light, nullifies status ailments once for 1 ally row for 2 turns. This skill is unaffected by duration-extending skills.
Detail: Enveloped in divine light, nullifies status ailments once for 1 ally row for 2 turns.

Name: MAKALTU
Effects: Generates an encompassing wall of Magic Power that increases the Defense Power of 1 row of allies for 3 turns.
Detail: Defense Power incrementally increased further based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: MAKANITO
Effects: Fouls the air with a chance of suffocating 1 enemy row. More effective against low-level targets.
Detail: Probability increased based on skill level.

Name: Malefic Wind
Effects: Envelopes the area in concentrated magic power, dealing moderate spell damage to 1 enemy row and dispels 1 multi-turn buff on that row.
Detail: Efficacy and probability increased based on skill level. Number of removals is incrementally increased.

Name: MAMIGAL
Effects: Launches a torrent of water that deals minor water spell damage to 1 enemy row.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: MAREIN
Effects: A radiance of mourning for the dead shines down on the undead in 1 enemy row with a chance to obliterate them based on the user's Divine Power.
Detail: Probability increased based on skill level.

Name: MASOLOTU
Effects: Conjures an apparition that increases the Evasion of 1 ally row for 3 turns.
Detail: Evasion incrementally increased further based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: Master of the Hunt
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Attack Power and Action Speed increased further.
Detail: Attack Power and Action Speed increased further based on skill level.

Name: MAZELOS
Effects: Launches an orb of immense spite that deals minor dark spell damage to 1 enemy row.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: Mel the Thief's Trap Decipher
Effects: Continuously increases Disarm Trap.
Detail: Disarm Trap increased further based on skill level.

Name: Mental Unity
Effects: Increases Spell Attack damage for 4 turns.
Detail: Spell attack damage increased further based on skill level.

Name: Midsummer Valor
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with SP and Surety increased even further.
Detail: SP and Surety increased further based on skill level.

Name: MIGAL
Effects: Launches an orb of water that deals minor water spell damage to 1 enemy.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: MILWA
Effects: Calls into being a light that illuminates the surroundings, expanding visibility during exploration until a certain distance is traveled. The caster's Action Speed is reduced at the start of battle. Decreases flee success rate for all allies.
Detail: The distance over which the effect persists is increased at specific levels. The surroundings become slightly visible even in areas where the corresponding map is unavailable at specific levels.

Name: Miracle of Faith
Effects: Increases Magic Defense when equipped with light armor.

Name: Mirage Hunting
Effects: Moderate physical attack with high Accuracy on 1 enemy. Surety and Surety Damage increases the higher the user's Evasion. Damage is reduced if learned by someone other than Gold Maiden.
Detail: Efficacy, Surety, and Surety Damage increased based on skill level.

Name: Mist of Reversal Stance
Effects: User takes a Defensive Stance for 1 turn. While in this stance, damage received from spell attacks is reduced. Magic Power is increased for 5 turns based on the efficacy of the spell attack taken. The stance ends when an attack is received.
Detail: Damage taken further reduced and Magic Power further increased based on skill level.

Name: Moment of Finality
Effects: Unleashes the blasting spell contained with a charm, launching an untyped spell attack on 1 enemy row that bypasses Magic Defense. Damage based on Attack Power. Damage is reduced if learned by someone other than Rinne.
Detail: Efficacy and Magic Defense bypass rate increased based on skill level.

Name: Monolith-Bearer
Effects: Imbues the equipped katana with a earth-type trait.
Detail: Damage dealt when striking a weak point with a earth-type weapon increased based on skill level.

Name: MONTINO
Effects: Silence over a wide area envelopes 1 enemy row with a chance of Spell-binding them.
Detail: Probability increased based on skill level.

Name: Moonlit Pool of the White Daemon
Effects: Moderate water-type physical attack on 1 enemy. Ignores distance modifiers. Damage, probability of Spell-Binding, and the rate of Magic Power reduction are reduced if learned by someone other than Livana.
Detail: Efficacy increased, with probability further increased and Magic Power further decreased based on skill level.

Name: MORLIS
Effects: Generates an acidic mist over a wide area with a chance of reducing the Defense Power of 1 enemy row for 3 turns.
Detail: Probability increased while Defense Power decreased incrementally based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: Mudd's Caution
Effects: Continuously increases Detect.
Detail: Detect increased further based on skill level.

Name: Mutual Interests
Effects: Increases damage to enemies for user and allies in front of or behind them if the ally is evil.

Name: Mysta Energy Manipulation
Effects: Increases Magic Power when equipped with a yoto.
Detail: Magic Power increased further based on skill level.

Name: Nameless Loyalty
Effects: Increases Tolerance of Sleep and Stun for user and all adjacent good allies.

Name: Natural Combatant
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Evasion greatly increased in particular.
Detail: Evasion increased further based on skill level.

Name: Ninja Dual Wield
Effects: When equipped with a dagger, a dagger can be equipped in the left hand. When equipped with a throwing weapon, a throwing weapon can be equipped in the left hand. When using Ninja Dual Wield, Evasion and Action Speed are reduced.
Detail: Damage reduction rate is reduced when attacking with the left hand, based on skill level. The rate of left-hand Attack Power added to right-hand Attack Power when using attack skills is increased.

Name: NOFIS
Effects: Calls forth a calamity over a wide area with a chance of reducing the Magic Defense of 1 enemy row for 3 turns.
Detail: Probability increased while Magic Defense further decreased based on skill level.

Name: Nose for Treasure
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Disarm Trap and Detect increased further.
Detail: Disarm Trap and Detect increased further based on skill level.

Name: Nose for Wealth
Effects: Increases the chance of obtaining sellable items from treasure chests.
Detail: Probability increased based on skill level.

Name: Oath of Fortitude
Effects: Increases Tolerance of Confusion, Charm, and Fear for user and all adjacent neutral allies.

Name: Old Sage With the Baby Face
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with MP and Magic Power increased even further.
Detail: MP and Magic Power increased further based on skill level.

Effects: Continuously increases each stat. Accuracy and Defense Power increased further.
Detail: Accuracy and Defense Power increased further based on skill level.

Effects: Increases Attack Power and Accuracy when equipped with a dagger, one-handed sword, or one-handed axe.
Detail: Attack Power and Accuracy increased further based on skill level.

Name: Path Walked with a Skull
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with HP and MP increased even further.
Detail: HP and MP increased further based on skill level.

Name: Penetrating Shot
Effects: Moderate physical attack of 1 enemy row. Bypasses Defense Power. Efficacy increases with Attack Power and Accuracy.
Detail: Efficacy and Defense Power bypass rate increased based on skill level.

Name: Pinnacle of the Flower District
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with SP ad Attack Power increased further.
Detail: SP and Attack Power increased further based on skill level.

Name: Planned Hunting
Effects: Increases damage against magical beasts and decreases damage from magical beasts.

Name: Poised All-Out Strike
Effects: Moderate physical attack on 1 enemy. This skill cannot be used on the next turn after it is used.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: Poison Attack
Effects: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy. Chance to poison based on the user's Dexterity.
Detail: Efficacy and probability increased and poison damage augmented based on skill level.

Name: Poison Berry
Effects: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy. If the target is poisoned, cures the poison and inflicts critical poison. Does not cure Poison if the target is already affected by critical poison.
Detail: Efficacy and critical poison damage incerased based on skill level.

Name: PORTO
Effects: Blows a tailwind that increases the Action Speed of 1 ally for 3 turns.
Detail: Action Speed incrementally increased further based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: Practical Self-Defense
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, SP and Resistance increased further.
Detail: SP and Resistance increased further based on skill level.

Name: Prayer of Rebellion
Effects: Generates flames of rebellion that increase the Attack Power and Resistance of 1 row of allies for 3 turns. Attack Power and Resistance increase amount and number of turns are reduced if learned by someone other than Red Beard.
Detail: Attack Power and Resistance incrementally increased further based on skill level. Additional turns added.

Name: Precision Strike
Effects: Minor physical attack with high Accuracy on 1 enemy. bypasses Defense Power and guarantees a decisive hit on enemies in preparation.
Detail: Efficacy increased while Defense Power further bypassed based on skill level.

Name: Presence of Mind
Effects: Attacks become more likely to hit, even enemies that are out of range.

Name: Priest Weapon Mastery
Effects: Piety value is added to Attack Power.
Detail: Additional Piety increased further based on skill level.

Name: Protector of the Kingdom
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, HP and Defense Power increased further.
Detail: HP and Defense Power increased further based on skill level.

Name: Pursuit of Prayer
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, HP and Divine Power increased further.
Detail: HP and Divine Power increased further based on skill level.

Name: Queen of War and Love
Effects: Restores minor HP to all allies upon winning a battle. Recovery amount is reduced if learned by someone other than Lanavaille.
Detail: Recovery amount increased based on skill level.

Name: Quickdraw Stance
Effects: Transition to Quickdraw Stance and perfom Quickdraw Slash 1 turn later. Evades and counters with Quickdraw: Reverse Wave when taking a physical attack. Stance is canceled if hit by non-physical attacks. Usable only when a katana is equipped at the start of a turn.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: Raging King I
Effects: Moderate physical attack with high Accuracy on 1 enemy. For each time the user is attacked from the end of their turn until the start of their next, their damage increases on that turn.  The damage increase effect resets at the end of the user's turn. Damage is reduced if learned by someone other than Galbadus.

Name: Recovery
Effects: Chance to remove 1 naturally-recoverable status affliction at the start of own turn (affected by luck).
Detail: Probability increased based on skill level.

Name: Red Spinner Mage
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with HP and Sleep Tolerance increased further.
Detail: HP and Sleep Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

Name: REILIS
Effects: Words of prayer that cure 1 ally of Fear, Confusion, or Charm.
Detail: Resistance up and HP recovery incrementally added based on skill level. Increased Resistance, area of Effects. and recovery amount.

Name: REINIKUS
Effects: Words of prayer that cure 1 ally of Stone.
Detail: Resistance up and HP recovery incrementally added based on skill level. Increased Resistance, area of Effects. and recovery amount.

Name: Royal Knight Aspirant
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, SP and Accuracy increased further.
Detail: SP and Accuracy increased further based on skill level.

Name: Sacred Blessing
Effects: Reduces own damage taken from undead.
Detail: Damage decreased further based on skill level.

Name: Sacred Healer
Effects: Reduces the MP cost of DIOS and MADIOS.

Name: Sacred Resistance
Effects: Increases own Resistance and Divine Power during ambushes for 2 turns.
Detail: Resistance and Divine Power increased further based on skill level.

Name: Salvation through Wealth
Effects: Continuously increases each stat. MP and Curse Tolerance Trap increased further.
Detail: MP and Curse Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

Name: Sanctified Prayer
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, with Divine Power and Magic Defense increased further.
Detail: Divine Power and Magic Defense increased further based on skill level.

Name: Scatter Shot
Effects: Minor physical attack 5 times on random enemies. If the same enemy is hit multiple times, damage decreases with each additional hit. Efficacy increases with Attack Power and Accuracy
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: Second Arrow
Effects: When attacking with a normal attack or attack skill, if there are multiple enemies, there is a chance to attack a different enemy instead (affected by Luck).
Detail: Probability increased based on skill level.

Name: Secret Art of LABADIOS
Effects: Can use LABADIOS once during the battle when placed in the center of the back row. If LABADIOS has been learned. the power of that secret art is enhanced.

Name: Secret Art of LAERLIK
Effects: Can use LAERLIK once during the battle when placed in the center of the back row. If LAERLIK has been learned. the power of that secret art is enhanced.

Name: Secret Art of LAFOROS
Effects: Can use LAFOROS once during the battle when placed in the center of the back row. If LAFOROS has been learned. the power of that secret art is enhanced.

Name: Self-Defense
Effects: Greatly increases own Defense Power and Magic Defense for 3 turns.
Detail: Defense Power and Magic Defense incrementally increased further based on skill level. More turns added.

Name: Self-Healing
Effects: Continuously restores own minor HP for 3 turns.
Detail: Recovery amount increased based on skill level.

Name: Shadowy Alignment
Effects: Increases Evasion when equipped with a dagger or throwing weapon.

Name: Shedding Armor, Flashing Blade
Effects: Greatly increases own Action Speed, Evasion, and Surety rate for 5 turns.  Defense Power and Magic Defense gained from equipment becomes 0.
Detail: Own Action Speed, Evasion, and Surety rate further increased based on skill level.

Name: Sidestep
Effects: Increases Evasion when equipped with cloth.

Name: Sir Jack's Mettle
Effects: Continuously increases HP.
Detail: HP increased further based on skill level.

Name: Skull Study
Effects: Continuously reduces the MP/SP cost of Thief spells/skills that cost 3-10 MP/SP.

Name: Skull's Tutelage
Effects: Decreases physical damage taken from enemies and increases HP when user is in the back row.

Name: Slayer of the White Calamity
Effects: Increases damage to magical beasts. If a battle begins against an enemy caught in a trap, damage to magical beasts is also increased for allies directly in front of or behind the user.

Name: Smoke Bomb
Effects: Chance to greatly reduce the Accuracy of close-range attacks for all enemies and all allies for 2 turns. Increases flee success rate for all allies.
Detail: Accuracy rate of close-range attacks further decreased, while the number of uses and  flee success rate are further increased based on skill level.

Name: Sneak Attack
Effects: Major physical attack on 1 enemy. Bypasses Defense Power and ignores distance modifiers and Guard. Can only be activated while hidden.
Detail: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

Name: Sniper
Effects: When performing a physical attack, deals damage based on Attack Power and Accuracy.

Name: Soaring Beast Knight

Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Magic Defense and Stun Tolerance increased further.

Name: Spellcraft Bookmark
Effects: Reduces the MP/SP cost and increases damage dealt to enemies if the same spell attack as in the previous action is selected.

Name: Stealth
Effects: Continuously increases Initiative rate.

Name: Stirring Righteousness
Effects: Increases damage to enemies for everyone in the user's row if it has only good or neutral allies.

Name: Storm-Bearer
Effects: Imbues the equipped katana with an air-type trait.
Detail: Damage dealth when striking a weak point with an air-type weapon increased based on skill level.

Name: Strike of Righteous Fury
Effects: Minor physical attack on all enemies in the frontmost enemy row. Enrages the attacked enemy and has a chance to decrease their Defense Power based on the user's Strength for 2 turns. Enraged enemies will have reatly increased efficacy when attacking. The enraged status is note affected by effect duration-extending skills.  Usable only when an odachi is equipped at the start of the turn.

Name: Strong and Gentle Priest
Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Defense Power and Resistance increased further.

Detail: Efficacy and probability increased based on skill level.

Name: Superior Principles
Effects: Further increases damage dealt when attacking with an element type that the target is weak against.

Name: Tactical Bola
Effects: Entangles 1 enemy with a tactical bola. For a set number of turns, it deals continuous HP damage to the entangled enemy when it performs close-range attacks, and has a chance to inflict Poison each tim conti uous HP damage occurs.
Detail: Continuous HP damage, Poison infliction chance, and Poison damage amount increased based on skill level.

Effects: Continuously increases each stat, Disarm Trap and Evade Trap increased further.
Detail: Disarm Trap and Evade Trap increased further based on skill level.

Name: Thousand Hue Blossom
Effects: Performs a minor physical attack on a random target, with double the hit count, and a chance to inflict Charm. If this skill damages an already Charmed enemy, the Charm status affliction will not be removed. Charm effect is lost and damage is reduced if learned by someone other than Yuzunamiki.

Name: Thousandfold Grip
Effects: Increases Surety rate of odachi-specific skills, Ephemeral Illusion Stance, Running Flame, Running Blaze, and Running Inferno when equipped with an odachi.

Effects: Imbues the equipped katana with a water-type trait.

Name: True Eye Stance
Effects: The stance taken at the start of battle. If in a different stance, performing a normal attack will switch it to True Eye Stance.
Detail: Enters True Eye Stance at the start of battle. If in a different stance, performing a normal attack will switch it to True Eye Stance.

Name: True Words of Fire
Effects: Deals minor fire spell damage to 1 enemy. Chance to decrease the enemy's Accuracy and Defense Power for 3 turns. Damage increased based on the mage or Tall Mage's class level. Damage reduced, and Accuracy and Defense Power decrease chance and number of turns are reduced if learned by someone other than Berkanan.
Detail: Chance increased further, Accuracy/Defense Power decreased further, and number of continuous turns increased based on skill level.

Effects: Continuously increases each stat. Detect and Fear Tolerance increased further.
